tool_description: Browse through studies of the faculties/entire university, get information and publications of academic staff
name: Leiden University Unofficial API
title: Leiden University Unofficial API

api_list.name: Studies of type [bachelor|master] at faculty X
api_list.description: Filter on bachelor or master type at a specific faculty
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leiden-university-unofficial-api.p.rapidapi.com/Leiden/Studies/science/master/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leiden-university-unofficial-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://leiden-university-unofficial-api.p.rapidapi.com/Leiden/Studies/{faculty}/{type}/{pagenr}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leiden-university-unofficial-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Academic staff at faculty X institute Y and department Z

api_list.name: Acedemic Staff Leiden
api_list.description: Lists a total of 15 academic staff numbers of Leiden University at page {pagenr} the output also contains the maximum amount of page results, so it can be incorporated into a for loop
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leiden-university-unofficial-api.p.rapidapi.com/Leiden/Staff/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leiden-university-unofficial-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
